Package com.lambdaschool.oktafoundation.exceptions

Class CustomErrorDetails

java.lang.Object
org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.DefaultErrorAttributes
com.lambdaschool.oktafoundation.exceptions.CustomErrorDetails
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.ErrorAttributes, org.springframework.core.Ordered, org.springframework.web.servlet.HandlerExceptionResolver
@Component
public class CustomErrorDetails
extends org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.DefaultErrorAttributes
Class to override the error details provided by Spring Boot. We want to use our own format.

  • Method Details

    • getErrorAttributes

      public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,​java.lang.Object> getErrorAttributes​(org.springframework.web.context.request.WebRequest webRequest, boolean includeStackTrace)
      Custom method to override the error details provided by Spring Boot. We want to use our own format.
      Specified by:
      getErrorAttributes in interface org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.ErrorAttributes
      Overrides:
      getErrorAttributes in class org.springframework.boot.web.servlet.error.DefaultErrorAttributes
      Parameters:
      webRequest - The information related to the request that was made and the exceptions that occurred.
      includeStackTrace - Should we include the Stack Trace in our output. This field is not used in our implementation.
      Returns:
      a Map of String, Object with our information to report in place of the standard Spring Boot information.
